definition: خرع karu‘a u (kur‘, خراعة kurā‘a) and kari‘a a (kara‘) to droop, be or become slack, limp, flabby; to be or become languid, soft, spineless, yielding VII do. VIII to invent, devise, contrive (هـ s.th.); to create. originate (هـ s.th.) خرع kari‘ and خريع karī‘ soft, languid, yielding, spineless, devoid of energy, nerveless
